        public IBitmap getBitmap()

        Returns the bitmap for this texture.
        Specified by:

      • getTextureFormat

        public int getTextureFormat()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the format of this texture.

        This is usually the GL representation of the bitmap format. (ex. IGL11.GL_RGBA)

        Specified by:
        getTextureFormat in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the format of the texture.

      • getInternalFormat

        public int getInternalFormat()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the internal format the GL will use to store the texture.

        This will usually be the same as ITexture.getTextureFormat(), and on some platforms it is even required to be the same (ex. Android).

        Specified by:
        getInternalFormat in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the internal format.

      • getUnpackAlignment

        public int getUnpackAlignment()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the data alignment for the start of each pixel row.

        Generally this is 4 for IBitmap.FORMAT_RGBA_8888 and 1 for IBitmap.FORMAT_RGB_888.

        For more information see the OpenGL specification.

        Specified by:
        getUnpackAlignment in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        The number of bytes to which the data is aligned. Usually a value in (1, 2, 4, 8).

      • getDataType

        public int getDataType()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the data type for this texture.

        This specifies the number of bits per channel (component).
        Most common are formats where each channel gets 8 bits (ex. IBitmap.FORMAT_RGBA_8888) and, in OpenGL for example, use IGL11.GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE.

        Specified by:
        getDataType in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the data type.

      • getFilterMin

        public int getFilterMin()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the filter setting that will be used for texture minification.

        For OpenGL this may be IGL11.GL_LINEAR or IGL11.GL_NEAREST.

        Specified by:
        getFilterMin in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the minification filter setting.

      • getFilterMag

        public int getFilterMag()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the filter setting that will be used for texture magnification.

        For OpenGL this may be IGL11.GL_LINEAR or IGL11.GL_NEAREST.

        Specified by:
        getFilterMag in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the magnification filter setting.

      • getWrapS

        public int getWrapS()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the wrap setting that will be used for the S (or U or X) texture coordinate.

        For OpenGL this may be IGL11.GL_REPEAT or IGL11.GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE.

        Specified by:
        getWrapS in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the wrap setting for S coordinates.

      • getWrapT

        public int getWrapT()
        Description copied from interface: ITexture
        Returns the wrap setting that will be used for the T (or V or Y) texture coordinate.

        For OpenGL this may be IGL11.GL_REPEAT or IGL11.GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE.

        Specified by:
        getWrapT in interface ITexture
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the wrap setting for T coordinates.
